login_verify_error: You need to verify your email.
register_password_error_weak: The password provided is too weak.
register_account_exists: An account with this email already exists.
register_succes_message: Check you inbox to validate your email. (It may appear in the spam folder)
main_instruction: Describe your most recent dream and choose the way in which you want it to be interpreted and finished:
ad_instruction: Watch ADs to get rewards that can be used for more dreams.
ad_instruction_2: Each time you watch an AD, you will get 1 free dream.
ad_error: Ad could not load, please try again in the following minutes.
error_multiple_tags: You can only select one tag
error_dream: Your dream is empty, please write something.
error_points: You dont have any dream points left, you can get them by watching ads.
confirm_logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
go_back_warning: Are you sure you want to go back? You will lose this dream's explanation and ending. Make sure you have copied and shared it with your friends.
connection_error: There has been an error with the connection. Please try again in the following minutes...
feature_soon: This feature will be available in the next update.
internet_error_data: There has been an error trying to retrieve your session data. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
